inclusion.criterion: treated within 24 hours of symptom onset
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: administered intravenous recombinant tissue plasminogen activator (t-PA) and high-dose statin therapy

inclusion.criterion: MRI with evidence of at least one DWI lesion, consistent with ischemia
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI of the head revealed an acute 1.7-cm infarct of the right periventricular white matter and posterior right basal ganglia

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: no mention of seizures or migraine

exclusion.criterion: renal failure, defined as Glomerular Filtration Rate (GFR) <30 ml/min
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: ongoing bleeding risks or unsuitable for dabigatran therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: additional pathology including arteriovenous malformations, intracranial aneurysms, tumours, or abscess
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Planned thrombolysis or endovascular intervention for the index event
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Thrombolysis for ischemic stroke within preceding 7 days
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Planned carotid endarterectomy/carotid artery stent within 30 days
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any history of spontaneous intracranial bleeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clear indication for anticoagulation, including atrial fibrillation, mechanical cardiac valves, deep venous thrombosis, pulmonary embolism or known hypercoagulable state
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Co-morbid illness with expected life expectancy of <30 days
exclusion.label: not_met
